name: Bourbon Strawberry Iced Tea

ingredients.name: Rich simple syrup (2 parts sugar, 1 part water)

preparation:
Bourbon, strawberries and iced tea come together to make this mellow summer sipper, perfect for the Fourth of July or any other day you’re craving something tall, cool and easy-drinking.

Add the strawberries and lemon juice into a mixing glass and gently muddle.

Add the syrup and bourbon, fill the glass with ice, and shake until well-chilled.

Strain into a Collins glass over fresh ice.

Top with unsweetened iced tea.

Garnish with a mint sprig and skewered blueberries and strawberries.
